title: Kendall Jenner launches new hair styling range that goes on sale at Argos very soon
text:
Get the biggest money stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

She has been on the fashion runways since 2012, but you should also know that Kendall Jenner is now making a mark on the beauty industry.

Back in 2018, the 23-year-old bonafide supermodel teamed up with hair care brand Formawell to release a range of must-have hair tools that were only available in the US.

Now British beauty addicts will soon be able get their hands on the Jenner sibling's very own hair styling collection from high street chain Argos .

The chic-looking range is designed to create effortless styles and healthy-looking hair and features a curling iron (£49.99), straightener (59.99) and blow dryer (£69.99).

Eager shoppers can find the hair tools at Argos stores from Wednesday October 23.

Whilst the collection looks extravagant, the prices are really affordable and you get amazing salon quality.

Each tool is created with Formawell's blend of minerals and 24K gold, which naturally emits negative ions and infrared energy, making it gentler on hair.

It was only recently that Kendall Jenner went back to her famous brunette locks after going blonde in September 2019.

Whether you want to re-create the model's tumbling soft waves or sleek straight styles, the Formawell X Kendall Jenner range is easy to use and won't hurt your wallet either.

Find your nearest Argos using the store locator online .

If you're in the market for some home laser and IPL hair removal tools, check out our handy roundup of the best .
description: The affordable hair styling tools from Formawell are designed to improve the condition of your locks and help you create effortless hairstyles Kendall is famous for rocking
